message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it could really benefit you.  Given its value, I'm offering it to you for $20,000.
Alice,  $20,000 is way out of my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $12,000.  Let's see if we can work something out.
Bob, I appreciate you countering. I'm willing to be flexible, but $12,000 is significantly less than what I value the product at. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?

Alice,  I understand your position, but $17,000 is still more than I can afford right now.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000, which is a fair compromise.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward with that price.
